attributes.review: This app took so long to download 🙄. And not only did it ask me for my address 🤔but when I did put my address Donald trump 🍊came to my house slapped me on my knee 😳and said if I don’t vote for him I will get deported 😿even though I was born in America😖
attributes.title: Rate this app one star

attributes.review: i downloaded the app and suddenly it started glitched crazily🤰. not to mention that it took forever to download 🧞‍♀️. some might say it’s my connection but considering how low quality the app is i don’t think so🧟‍♀️. WOULD NOT RECOMMEND. REMOVE THIS APP‼️
attributes.title: This App Is Far Too Beneath Me 🧚🧚

attributes.review: This app is one of the worst apps I’ve ever gotten.  If I could give it negative stars, I would. It took weeks to download, and it made me racist. I would not recommend this to anyone who is against racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, etc.
attributes.title: Awful. Just awful.

attributes.review: Every time I go to open the app, it shuts down and glitches out. You would think the developers for the own president would care about what they put in the App Store... wish I could give it 0 stars....
attributes.title: AWFUL APP!!!

attributes.review: It told me to go back to my country only after just saying I was Muslim, child. Also v slow and even when i was taking watering my lake, i couldn’t make it to the oklahoma rally it happened so last minute though
attributes.title: Racist

attributes.review: When i entered the app it was such a mess, the colors were all off and the text is lopsided and different sizes. I had to sneeze and after i sneezed i heard someone say bless you to me. I looked into my camera and they was someone looking back. TRUMP IS SPYING ON YOU THROUGH THIS APP AND TAKING YOUR PERSONAL INFORMATION. YOU HAVE BEEN WARNED
attributes.title: HE IS SPYING ON YOU

attributes.review: The app took forever to download and kept crashing every 5 minutes. It’s extremely glitchy and took me ages to sign up. This app is absolute garbage and I would give it negative stars if I could. Disgusting.
attributes.title: Do NOT download

attributes.review: took FOREVERRRRR to download. as soon as i the app loaded it crashed, i can’t even open the app and more. i was sent some really weird stuff by the app such as extremely racist, sexist, homophobic, and just all around horrible things to say.
attributes.title: trash

attributes.review: I went to app this app and I just got it it has wiped everything off my phone it was why my phone got hacked and it wouldn’t let me add the app until I give it very personal information.  💅🏻✨
attributes.title: Inexpressibly horrible

attributes.review: My phone has been acting slow ever since I downloaded this app. Wish there was a way to make it less than 1 star. 0/10, I will not be recommending this to anyone.
attributes.title: Less than one star
